long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your boring new tab page into a stunning masterpiece with Hapific Jot! 🎨 Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a breathtaking background image as well as the time and date displayed right on your new tab page 📅.

Stay organized and on top of your schedule by jotting down a note to remind yourself of anything important 📝. And, with the ability to pin any note from your jots on https://jot.hapific.com right to your new tab page 📌, you can stay on top of your to-do list or jot down important information with ease 🗒️.
